title: Rayleigh Distribution

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Rayleigh Distribution
Rayleigh distribution is used in signal processing.
It has two parameters:
scale
- (standard deviation) decides how flat the distribution will be  default 1.0).
size
- The shape of the returned array.
Example
Draw out a sample for rayleigh distribution with scale of 2 with size 2x3:
from numpy import random
x = random.rayleigh(scale=2, size=(2, 3))
print(x)

Visualization of Rayleigh Distribution
Example
from numpy import random
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns
sns.displot(random.rayleigh(size=1000), kind="kde")
plt.show()
Result

Similarity Between Rayleigh and Chi Square Distribution
At unit stddev and 2 degrees of freedom rayleigh and chi square represent the same distributions.

★
+1
